participant_1.background:
I have a family who supports my dreams of travel and photography.
i am a cashier at a grocery store.
I have amazing parents who support my every adventure.
i m in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
i m writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

participant_2.background:
I'm happy to be doing well in school.
I'm going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around.
I am not sure if it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor, but I do know that cats are awesome.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.

content.text: I am well, thank you for asking. How are you doing?
I am doing great! I am a cashier at a grocery store and I am working on my first novel. I play the saxophone in a jazz band and my parents are very supportive of my dreams of travel and photography.

That sounds very exciting! I am happy to hear that you are doing well. I am a student and I am doing well in school. I am going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around. I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day. My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.
What is your novel about? I am glad to hear that you are doing well in school. I also enjoy playing piano.

My novel is about a young woman who moves to a new city and starts a new job. She meets a group of friends and they go on adventures together. I am glad to hear that you enjoy playing piano. I usually play classical pieces in the morning.
That sounds like an interesting novel. I am looking forward to reading it. I also enjoy playing classical pieces in the morning.
Thank you for your interest in my novel. I am glad to hear that you also enjoy playing classical pieces in the morning.
I hope you have a great weekend!
